fullText: Jeremy Strong gives a performance of such volcanic intensity that it threatens to blow up the Circle in the Square Theatre. His Dr. Stockmann is a man possessed, and Strong plays him with the kind of full-body commitment that makes you worry for the actor's well-being.
dtliExcerpt: Jeremy Strong gives a performance of such volcanic intensity that it threatens to blow up the Circle in the Square Theatre. His Dr. Stockmann is a man possessed, and Strong plays him with the kind of full-body commitment that makes you worry for the actor's well-being.
